definitions.definition: Lacking dexterity in the use of the hands, or of instruments.
examples: John was awkward at performing the trick. He'll have to practice to improve.

definitions.definition: Not easily managed or effected ; embarrassing .
examples: That was an extremely awkward moment. Everyone was watching.

definitions.definition: Lacking social skills, or uncomfortable with social interaction.
examples: Things got awkward when my boss tried a cheesy pick-up line on me.
These cabinets are going to be very awkward when we move.

main_definition: Lacking dexterity in the use of the hands, or of instruments.
secondary_definitions: Not easily managed or effected ; embarrassing .
Lacking social skills, or uncomfortable with social interaction.
